Product title: Shampoo and Conditioner Dispenser,Shower Soap Dispenser 3 Chamber No Drill Wall-Mounted Shampoo Dispenser for Shower Wall Mounted Shower Dispenser for Bathroom Hotel Large Capacity,Black
Key Features: 🔍FRIENDLY MATERIAL🔎--The shower dispenser is made of anti drop ABS material, super sturdy and durable, heat-resistant, not easily deformed, corrosion-resistant, not rusty, waterproof, wear-resistant, easy to clean. In addition, the wall mounted shower soap dispenser is lighter and less prone to falling when hung on the wall, and can be pressed more than 500000+ times. | 🔍HIGH-CAPACITY🔎--Show shampoo dispense holds 300 ML/12.85 US (each Chamber), easy to refill with soap liquid; Transparent visual window,easy to know the liquid amount clearly and replenish shampoo in time; Large button is easy to release liquid, dispense appropriate amount of liquid each time, No leakage& save shampoo | 🔍LOCKABLE DESIGN🔎--Shower soap dispenser 3 chamber no drill equipped with a key lock to prevent any unnecessary loss, especially strengthen management in public places , suitable for different types of liquids such as shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, laundry detergent, dishwashing soap, shower gel, hand sanitizer, etc. | 🔍NO DRILLED INSTALLATION🔎--Shampoo dispenser for shower wall mounted comes with screws and non-nail sticker,The holes on the back panel are used to screw the shower wall shampoo dispenser to the wall,or you can mount it on the wall using the included non-marking sticker, easy to install&suitable for most smooth walls. | 🔍COMMERCIAL/HOME USAGE🔎--Soap dispenser bathroom suitable for storage and cleaning in bathrooms, kitchens, schools, hospitals or hotels;the black soap dispenser looks high-end and better matches your bathroom decoration,replace messy bottles ,making your countertops immediately organized and improving bathroom space, making your life more convenient and interesting.
comment 1: I purchased this dispenser as a trial for my personal home before committing to it more broadly. After using it, I’m very happy with the quality and overall design.The dispenser has a clean, modern look, dispenses a consistent amount of product, and feels sturdier than I expected for the price. Installation was quick and straightforward, and it immediately made the shower feel more organized and elevated.I plan to purchase at least one more for our personal home to keep things consistent, and if it continues to hold up well over time, I’ll be rolling this same model out across multiple guest bathrooms in our short-term rentals. Durability and ease of use are especially important to us, and so far this has checked all the right boxes.I’ll plan to update this review after longer-term use, but at this point I would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for a stylish, practical dispenser for both home and guest use. - Bethany newlun
comment 2: This Item is Great. Very Clean Look while being practical and useful. I have been working on my smaller upstairs bathroom to make it more comfortable, functional and visually pleasing.This item was a little smaller than I anticipated but that ended up working out. I noticed that I am wasting less product by not trying to pour shampoo, conditioner and body wash into my hands directly. The unit is well built. Each container is removable for easy refilling and comes with a locking top with a key. I chose not to utilize the stickers that came with it because I liked how it looked without them and I am the only one that uses this bathroom. Thank you for such a great product. - Jason Palmari
comment 3: I love this thing. It was super easy to install, with no damage at all to my tiles. I’ve had it over 6 months now and it hasn’t budged once! It’s extremely easy to fill/refill and it looks very classy. My one minor complaint is that our shampoo one (which gets used the most because my husband thinks shampoo is all purpose) intermittently gets stuck and you have to wiggle it around to get it to pump again. Bonus points: it’s the perfect gap from the shower wall to put your phone behind it if you are someone who watches YouTube while showering (like the aforementioned husband). - martha berg
comment 4: I spent a fair amount of time looking at reviews of dispensers like this, but many of them did not seem to hold up long.I finally made a decision to start with this product feeling like I may have to try several to find one that lasts and performs well.After nearly a year of daily use this dispenser is showing no signs of stopping.It was very easy to install with the sticky pad that is provided, and while I had my doubts about the pad sticking for an extended period of time in a shower it has not been a problem.We have shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in ours. From the more runny body wash to the very thick conditioner the dispenser does not leak or have any problems dispensing the different viscosities.The provided labels that you can apply your self if you choose to have also held up well in the shower environment and provide a nice ascetic. Various cleaning agents such as scrubbing bubbles has not degraded the stickers or the print in any way.This product offers so much convenience, declutters your shower and adds a feel of luxury to your life that can’t be beat at this price point. - Amazon Customer
